properties.name: ui.max-profiles-per-page
properties.description: Maximum number of profiles displayed per page.

properties.name: ui.production
properties.description: Expose production flag to UI templates.

properties.name: ui.host
properties.description: Base application host exposed to UI templates.

properties.name: ui.versions.css-common
properties.description: Static version token appended to the common CSS bundle.

properties.name: ui.versions.css-ex
properties.description: Static version token appended to the extra CSS bundle.

properties.name: ui.versions.js-common
properties.description: Static version token appended to the common JS bundle.

properties.name: ui.versions.js-ex
properties.description: Static version token appended to the extra JS bundle.

properties.name: ui.versions.js-messages
properties.description: Static version token appended to the i18n messages JS bundle.

properties.name: app.ui.mvc.enabled
properties.description: Enable legacy MVC/Thymeleaf controllers.

properties.name: uid.max-tries
properties.description: Maximum number of attempts to generate a unique UID.

properties.name: uid.suffix.alphabet
properties.description: Alphabet used when generating UID suffixes.

properties.name: uid.suffix.length
properties.description: Length of the generated UID suffix.

properties.name: media.storage.root-path
properties.description: Root directory that stores uploaded media assets.

properties.name: media.optimization.jpegtran
properties.description: Absolute path to the jpegtran binary used for image optimization.

properties.name: notification.config.path
properties.description: Classpath resource that contains notification definitions.

properties.name: social.facebook.client-id
properties.description: Facebook application client identifier.

properties.name: social.facebook.client-secret
properties.description: Facebook application client secret.

properties.name: app.search.elasticsearch.enabled
properties.description: Enable Elasticsearch integration.

properties.name: app.restore.show-link
properties.description: Show restore link on success page (dev-only helper).

properties.name: app.restore.token-ttl
properties.description: Time-to-live for restore tokens.

properties.name: app.restore.mail.enabled
properties.description: Enable sending restore links via email.

properties.name: app.restore.mail.from
properties.description: From address for restore emails (defaults to spring.mail.username).

properties.name: app.restore.mail.subject
properties.description: Subject line for restore emails.

properties.name: app.search.elasticsearch.privacy.index-info
properties.description: Index profile info text into Elasticsearch documents.

properties.name: app.search.elasticsearch.privacy.redact-info
properties.description: Redact sensitive patterns from profile info before indexing.

properties.name: app.security.remember-me.key
properties.description: Secret key used to sign remember-me cookies.

properties.name: app.security.remember-me.token-ttl
properties.description: Time-to-live for remember-me tokens.

properties.name: app.security.remember-me.parameter
properties.description: Request parameter name used to trigger remember-me.

properties.name: app.security.remember-me.cookie-name
properties.description: Cookie name used to store remember-me tokens.
